reviewText: This is probably one of the best action movies where evil babes get to outshine....Great action with hot babes in skimpy outfits....excellent storyline that deserves a remake...

The movie is great and I love the action sequences. Nancy Kwan looks beautiful here. The quality of the movie is great with some scratches throughout the film. The sound is in 2.0, so if you have a speaker system, they will sound in the front but not in your rear speakers. Many extras in this dvd, so I recommend it for the beautiful women and action scenes. I received the dvd promptly within 2 days.
A true "B" movie classic. A non-hero hero and beautiful bad girls. Certainly a film from an EARLIER age! All this and a GREAT price and VERY fast delivery. PERFECT!!
